Ensembl Utility Functions

Ensembl Utility Functions

ensemblBasic(gene = NULL)

ensemblGeneOntology(gene = NULL, nest = TRUE)

ensemblInterpro(gene = NULL, nest = TRUE)

ensemblPeptide(peptide = NULL)

Arguments

gene

Ensembl gene identifier.
nest

Return as nested tibble.
peptide

Ensembl peptide identifier.

Value

Ensembl metadata tibble.

Examples

gene <- "WBGene00000001"
peptide <- "ENSP00000380252"
ensemblBasic(gene) %>% glimpse()
#> Observations: 1
#> Variables: 7
#> $ gene          <chr> "WBGene00000001"
#> $ description   <chr> "phosphoinositide kinase AdAPter subunit  [Source:Ref...
#> $ biotype       <chr> "protein_coding"
#> $ chromosome    <chr> "I"
#> $ startPosition <int> 5107843
#> $ endPosition   <int> 5110164
#> $ strand        <int> 1
ensemblGeneOntology(gene, nest = FALSE) %>% glimpse()
#> Observations: 10
#> Variables: 3
#> $ gene                    <chr> "WBGene00000001", "WBGene00000001", "WBGene...
#> $ geneOntology            <chr> "GO:0019901", "GO:0040024", "GO:0008340", "...
#> $ geneOntologyDescription <chr> "protein kinase binding", "dauer larval dev...
ensemblInterpro(gene, nest = FALSE) %>% glimpse()
#> Observations: 2
#> Variables: 4
#> $ gene                     <chr> "WBGene00000001", "WBGene00000001"
#> $ interpro                 <chr> "IPR000980", "IPR001720"
#> $ interproDescription      <chr> "SH2 domain", "PI3K p85 subunit"
#> $ interproShortDescription <chr> "SH2", "PI3kinase_P85"
ensemblPeptide(peptide) %>% glimpse()
#> Observations: 1
#> Variables: 4
#> $ peptide             <chr> "ENSP00000380252"
#> $ hsapiensGene        <chr> "ENSG00000116044"
#> $ hsapiensName        <chr> "NFE2L2"
#> $ hsapiensDescription <chr> "nuclear factor, erythroid 2 like 2 [Source:HGN...
